description.lang: Flexibility: AC output on/off by manual or remote by APP Remote Control: Power on/off any device connecting to smart plug manually or by APP Power consumption: Measures the energy consumption of the connected devices. Schedule: setting your lights connected to Plug to turn on and off on a schedule. Z-wave Wireless signal repeater

1. When the state of Smart Plug (turn on or off the load) is changed: 1. Set Configuration parameter 0x03 to 0: Do not send Basic Report 2. Set Configuration parameter 0x03 to 1: Send Basic Report 3. Set Configuration parameter 0x03 to 2: Send Basic Report only when Load condition is changed not by Z-WAVE Command, such as short pressing. 2. Sending Meter Report.
Smart Plug keep detecting the load power, once the AC current exceeds 16.5A for more than 4 seconds, smart plug's relay will turn off.

name.lang: Setting the parameters 101~104 to the default states.

description.lang: Setting the parameters 101~104 to the default states.

name.lang: Setting time for sending meter report (watt)

description.lang: The interval time of sending meter report (watt) to associated device (Group Lifeline).

name.lang: Setting time for sending meter report (KWh)

description.lang: The interval of sending meter report (KWh) to association device (Group Lifeline).

name.lang: Setting time for sending meter report (voltage)

description.lang: The interval of sending meter report (voltage) to association device (Group Lifeline).

name.lang: Setting time for sending meter report (current)

description.lang: The interval time of sending meter report (current) to associated device (Group Lifeline).

name.lang: The value here represents minimum change in wattage (in terms of wattage) for a meter report to be sent

description.lang: When the change value of load power exceeds the setting value, smart plug will send meter report (watt) to associated device (Group Lifeline).

name.lang: The value here represents minimum change in wattage percent (in terms of percentage) for a meter report (watt) to be sent

description.lang: When the change value of the load power exceeds the setting value, smart plug will send meter report to associated device (Group Lifeline).

name.lang: Setting device status after power failure

description.lang: Define how the Plug reacts after the power supply is back on.
Smart Plug memorizes its state after a power failure.
Smart Plug does not memorize its state after a power failure. Connected device will be on after the power supply is reconnected.
Smart Plug does not memorize its state after a power failure. Connected device will be off after the power supply is reconnected.
Smart Plug can send notifications to associated device (Group Lifeline) when the status of smart plugs load is changed.
The LED status follows the load change.
when operating the load, The LED lights for 5 seconds and then turns off.
Configure LED Display mode to prevent light pollution at night.
The LED status follows the load change.
when operating the load, The LED lights for 5 seconds and then turns off.
